title: Add support for CloudSolrClient (zkHost) to SolrEntityProcessor
description: SolrEntityProcessor should provide a mechanism to connect to a full cloud install as well as a single Solr server.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: Patch adding zkHost and collection parameters to SolrEntityProcessor.  The collection parameter can also work in conjunction with the url parameter, if the URL is properly formed and ends with the context path (usually /solr).
